column5: We decided to try the Nith again since it had stopped raining.Start walking down and starts to pour,go figure.Go anyway not expecting much.We had alot of light taps and saw a bunch of fish swim around.We were also treated to a tail slap by the resident beaver.All told between the 2 of us we caught a rock bass,small mouth,chub, shiner and an alright sized sucker.Think we are going to try some different spots this weekend.Here are some pics.     Oh yeah,2 days without any sign of the pike.
